modName: ENB REDUX for Climates of Tamriel and CoT Weather patch
summary: Performance and beautiful atmospheric modification. Even for slow PC!
descriptionHtml:
[color=#6aa84f][size=4][b]ENB REDUX for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36396/?]Climates of Tamriel[/url] & [/b][/size][/color][color=#3c78d8][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/39799/?][size=4][b]CoT Weather patch[/b][/size][/url][/color]

[youtube]sDUbh8zRTgk[/youtube]

[b]Hello and welcome, dear friends![/b]
[color=#ff0000][size=4][b]This modification even for slow PC[/b][/size][/color]  configuration (but if vanilla Skyrim is working fine), but you get natural atmospheric environment, without any lags and trash options (you will never see here black night/soap/FPS drop options.)

[color=#cc0000][b]Do not ignore any moment of installation![/b][/color]
[b]INSTALLATION:[/b]
[b]WARNING![/b] - this mod requires SKSE to install - [url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]http://skse.silverlock.org/[/url]
1. First, you need download and install: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36396/?]Climates of Tamriel[/url] & [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/39799/?]CoT Weather Patch[/url]
2. Now, [url=http://enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0264.htm ]download ENB v0.264 archive here [/url]
then open archive - WrapperVersion folder,[color=#cc0000] [b]and extract only two files is "d3d9.dll" and "enbhost.exe"[/b][/color] put this two files to the game installed folder, not Data folder. [color=#999999](sorry, but this is stupid requirements from autor ENB core - Boris Vorontsov, so i can't give you archive with all files at once.)[/color]
3. Put files from folder "1. [MAIN CFG]" to My Games\My Games\Skyrim with replace
4. Put files from folder "2. [ENB REDUX]" to installed game folder, NOT Data folder!
[color=#ff0000][b]NOTE:[/b][/color] After installation, open SkyrimLauncher.exe then select your resolution again (default set to 1920x1080), also never turn off FXAA please.
Enjoy! [color=#666666][b]P.S. [color=#900000]Never use "ultra shadows"[/color] on skyrim launcher, or you can forget about smooth gameplay! Only High or lower. [/b][/color]
Done.

..............................................................................................................................................................................................
5. [color=#ff7700]OPTIONAL STEP[/color]. Only if you have much powerful PC, you can also activate DoF and Skylighting effect, to get better graphics, just copy "enbseries.ini" file from "3. [OPTIONAL for powerful PC]" folder, to your game folder, with replace.
..............................................................................................................................................................................................

------------------------------------------------------
[color=#ff7700]RECOMENDED MODS (like on screenshots):[/color]
------------------------------------------------------
Most recommended mod (after Climates of Tamriel) is Skyrim FLora overhaul. This mod replace textures trees/landscapes/grass/etc

1. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/141/?]Skyrim Flora Overhaul (SFO)[/url] and use [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55803/?]ORDENADOR[/url] , to optimize textures of this mod only. (for boost fps)
2. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1111/?]Pure Waters[/url]
3. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/607/?]Skyrim HD - 2K Textures[/url]
4. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18916/?]Lanterns Of Skyrim - All In One[/url]
5. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/23771/?]skyBirds - Airborne Perching Birds[/url]
6. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30401/?]City Trees & Plants Lush[/url]
7. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27043/?]Enhanced Lights and FX[/url]
author: DanielMiller
